item.description:
Announcing a new meeting for The Boston Ron Paul 2008 Meetup Group!

What: Ron Paul Revolution - plans for the future in the Boston area

When: Thursday, June 5, 7:30 p.m.

Where: Massachusetts Institute of Technology -- Cambridge
150 Albany Street (a yellow brick building)
Room Number 1112 -- first floor classroom

Building has three entrances. Enter at the entrance farthest from Massachusetts Ave.

Park on Albany Street for free after 6 pm or there is an MIT lot across the street where you can park without getting a ticket.


Contact: Doug Fuda
Antiwarleague.com
617 331-1491 (cell)
dougfuda@aol.com

Purpose: This meeting is the followup to our meeting in May at Wentworth. People will be reporting on possible plans for action to build momentum for a continuation of the "Revolution." Please join us with your ideas and suggestions.


Doug Fuda
Antiwarleague.com
14 Fletcher Street
Roslindale, MA 02131
USA
617 331-1491 (cell)
dougfuda@aol.com
item.name: Ron Paul Revolution - plans for the future in the Boston area
